name: Die Recast
description:
Every stat of the character is randomized after every death, and each dice is randomized with every throw. 

Earn GP by hitting the d20 with your dice to upgrade the maximum range of your stats. 

If the d20 hits three dice of the same color in a row, it will take extra damage (orange) or slow down (blue). 

(No music or sounds sorry play something on youtube in another tab idk)

(Also the win screen isn't appearing in the HTML version :( but I am still proud of you)

CONTROLS

[wasd] - move

[left click] - throw dice

------------------------------------------------------------

Made as part of the GMTK 2022 Game Jam with the theme "Roll of the Dice".
